name: ASICS Gel Kayano 31 Running Shoes
description: A premium running shoe featuring advanced GEL cushioning and enhanced stability, engineered for a responsive, comfortable run.
longDescription: The ASICS Gel Kayano 31 Running Shoes are built with cutting-edge GEL technology that delivers exceptional cushioning and shock absorption. Designed for runners seeking both performance and comfort, these shoes provide enhanced stability and a secure, ergonomic fit. The breathable upper ensures superior ventilation while the durable outsole offers reliable traction across various surfaces. Ideal for long-distance runs and everyday training, the Gel Kayano 31 combines innovative design with lasting durability for an outstanding running experience.

features.title: Advanced GEL Cushioning
features.description: Innovative GEL technology absorbs shock and enhances comfort during every stride.

features.title: Enhanced Stability
features.description: Rocker bottom shape for knee/hip/ankle relief

features.title: Breathable Upper
features.description: Lightweight, ventilated upper ensures excellent airflow for all-day comfort.

features.title: Ergonomic Fit
features.description: Adaptive design conforms to your foot for a customized, secure fit.
